Title: Requires student athletes participating in public school sponsored athletics complete anti-bullying, anti-hazing and anti-harassment training
Summary: Requires student athletes participating in public school sponsored athletics complete anti-bullying, anti-hazing and anti-harassment training.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring student athletes participating in public school sponsored athletics complete anti-bullying, anti-hazing and anti-harassment training
